article.title: McKenzie Assigned to J-5, Joint Staff
article.abstract: Lt. Gen. Kenneth F. McKenzie Jr., USMC, has been assigned as director, strategic plans and policy, J-5, Joint Staff; and senior member, U.S. delegation to the United Nations Military Staff Committee.
article.text: Lt. Gen. Kenneth F. McKenzie Jr., USMC, has been assigned as director, strategic plans and policy, J-5, Joint Staff; and senior member, U.S. delegation to the United Nations Military Staff Committee.
